Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers
  • Related Packages

    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ActivateEffectController
     
    CharactersController
    This class is used to manage the character's Scene.
    CloudController
    CloudController displays the Clouds on GUI
    ConnectionController
    The class ConnectionController handles the events from the scene connection.fxml
    DeckController
    Class DeckController is the class responsible for managing the deck.fxml file
    DisconnectionController
    The class DisconnectionController handles the disconnection.fxml file that corresponds to the disconnection page that appears when another player has disconnected.
    GameBoardController
    GameBoardController displays a concise view of the GameBoard on GUI
    GameOverController
     
    GameSelectionController
    GameSelectionController displays the scene where the client can choose which game to play on GUI
    IslandsPageController
    IslandsPageController displays all of the Islands from the Game Board on GUI
    PageController
    The class PageController is an abstract class which all the controllers of the GUI extend.
    SchoolBoardController
    SchoolBoardController displays the players's School Boards on GUI
    SingleIslandController
    Class SingleIslandController manages and populates the scene showing a single island, which corresponds to the file singleIsland.fxml.
    WaitingRoomController
    WaitingRoomController displays the Waiting Room on GUI
